#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int GCD(int a,int b)
{
	if(b == 0)
		return a;
	
	return GCD(b,a%b);
}
int main()
{
	long long t,k;
	cin>>t;
	k = t;
	while(t--)
	{
	
	int a,b,c;
	cin>>a>>b>>c ;
	
	if(  c%GCD(a,b) == 0)
		cout<<"Case "<<k-t<<": Yes"<<endl;
	else
		cout<<"Case "<<k-t<<": No"<<endl;
	
	
	}
 
}
